General:
- Testing schedule now starts 1 hour earlier for all regions
- EU matchmaking region is now split up into two regions based on language
- Shop search now highlights the relevant sections of the item tooltip that match the search string you've put in
- Fixed the Shop search not finding all the types of bonuses an item has
- Various adjustments to the Damage Report feature
- Damage Report now shows up by default when dead or spectating
- Added HUD Notifications on Soul Urn drop off to let depositor know they gained +25% Souls and +1 AP
- Reworked how cycling through spectators works. Space bar now cycles between all the players.
- You can now click on the top bar hero icons to jump to a specific hero while spectating
- You no longer automatically switch to other players when the player you are watching dies
- Fixed not being able to click on the portrait of a dead hero while spectating
- Reduced the flash damage effect on heroes to reduce visual noise
- Added in-world confirmation text when an enemy denies your soul orbs
- {{Icon|Affliction}} Affliction now has an AoE indicator buildup during cast
- {{Icon|Affliction}} Affliction now has more toxic elements in the cast and linger
- Updated {{Icon|Restorative Shot}} Restorative Shot impact and heal effects
- Updated {{Icon|Phantom Strike}} Phantom Strike effects
- Updated {{Icon|Restorative Locket}} Restorative Locket effects when casting on an ally
- Added {{Icon|Grey Talon}} Grey Talon {{Icon|Charged Shot}} Charged Shot sound effects
- Added currency sound effects for receiving small and large amount of souls
- Added new sound effects to picking up powerups and breakable drops
- Added a UI sound when entering hero select screen
- Fixed {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta's {{Icon|Stake}} Stake sometimes moving units that aren't supposed to be moved
- Fixed {{Icon|Majestic Leap}} Majestic Leap buff sticking around after attaching to zipline (caused audio bugs as well)
- Fixed Soul Urn walking back while the game is paused
- Fixed bugs with {{Icon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl and pause
- Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy's {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb, {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox's {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade, {{Icon|Warden}} Warden's {{Icon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask, {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta's {{Icon|Stake}} Stake, {{Icon|Alchemical Fire}} Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
- Fixed some instances of heroes being called by the wrong name
- Get Started tutorial VO has been replaced and some text has been updated
- Newsstand now has a lot more world lore news callouts
- Enabled support for FSR 2 by default
- Widened the street on the outer side of the factory/mansion
- Added street curb models around factory and mansion
- Added street curb overlay around factory and mansion
- Replaced temp arrows with street sign markings coming out of the mid temple
- Removed some fake doors to not confuse with juke closets
- Replaced older stone wall material with newer one in uptown areas
- Replaced item signs with new poster style and removed item signs on Yellow and Blue lanes
- Added rooftop smart prop trim where it was missing
Abilities:
- {{Icon|Affliction}} Affliction now has an AoE indicator buildup during cast
- {{Icon|Affliction}} Affliction now has more toxic elements in the cast and linger
- Added {{Icon|Grey Talon}} Grey Talon {{Icon|Charged Shot}} Charged Shot sound effects
- Fixed {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta's {{Icon|Stake}} Stake sometimes moving units that aren't supposed to be moved
- Fixed bugs with {{Icon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl and pause
- Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy's {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb, {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox's {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade, {{Icon|Warden}} Warden's {{Icon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask, {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta's {{Icon|Stake}} Stake, {{Icon|Alchemical Fire}} Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
- Fixed ability-based lifesteals not granting life from damage caused to shields (affects things like Hyperbeam T3, Siphon, {{Icon|Scorn}} Scorn, {{Icon|Life Drain}} Life Drain, {{Icon|Flog}} Flog and {{Icon|Concussive Combustion}} Concussive Combustion T3)
- {{Icon|Shoulder Charge}} Shoulder Charge speed increased by 25%
- {{Icon|Shoulder Charge}} Shoulder Charge distance increased by 15%
- {{Icon|Shoulder Charge}} Shoulder Charge now stuns enemies for 1s if it drags them into a wall
- {{Icon|Infernal Resilience}} Infernal Resilience now provides +1 Health Regen
- {{Icon|Infernal Resilience}} Infernal Resilience damage regenerated reduced from 20% to 18%
- {{Icon|Infernal Resilience}} Infernal Resilience T3 changed to +8% damage regenerated
- Fixed {{Icon|Siphon Life}} Siphon Life not healing you against shields
- {{Icon|Quantum Entanglement}} Quantum Entanglement ally radius increased from 8m to 9m
- {{Icon|Rain of Arrows}} Rain of Arrows flight duration reduced from 8s to 7s
- {{Icon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl spirit gain per kill increased from 4 to 5
- {{Icon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl base ability now stuns for 0.75s
- {{Icon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl base damage reduced from 300 to 250
- {{Icon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl T1 is now +100 damage
- {{Icon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl collision size reduced
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant replicated healing reduced from 45% to 35%
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant bullet lifesteal now scales with spirit power (0.18)
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant fire rate reduced from 15% to 10%
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant fire rate now scales with spirit power (0.2)
- Fixed {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb not going where you had targeted if you moved quickly during the cast
- {{Icon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike damage per meter reduced from 6.75 to 6.3
- {{Icon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike damage per meter spirit power scaling increased from 0.04 to 0.05
- {{Icon|Death Slam}} Death Slam range is now defined as the horizontal distance to the units rather than the distance from his position in the air (so being high up doesn't work against you)
- {{Icon|Death Slam}} Death Slam range reduced from 19m to 14m
- {{Icon|Death Slam}} Death Slam T1 reduced from +5m to +4m
- {{Icon|Death Slam}} Death Slam cone increased from 60 degrees to 75
- {{Icon|Death Slam}} Death Slam grab time reduced from 0.9 to 0.8
- Fixed {{Icon|Scorn}} Scorn not healing you against shields
- {{Icon|Sand Blast}} Sand Blast base duration reduced from 4s to 3.5s
- {{Icon|Sand Blast}} Sand Blast T1 reduced from +2s to +1.5s
- Fixed {{Icon|Time Wall}} Time Wall projectiles and bullets being stuck in the wall for its full duration instead of for the shorter time stop duration
- {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine collision radius reduced by 10%
- Fixed {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade not going where you had targeted if you moved quickly during the cast
- {{Icon|Enchanter's Satchel}} Enchanter's Satchel duration from 1.5s to 2s
- {{Icon|Enchanter's Satchel}} Enchanter's Satchel T3 changed to 2.5s Disarm
- {{Icon|Static Charge}} Static Charge cast range scaling reduced from 0.1 to 0.07
- {{Icon|Static Charge}} Static Charge base radius reduced from 8m to 5m
- {{Icon|Static Charge}} Static Charge T2 changed to +5m radius
- {{Icon|Crow Familiar}} Crow Familiar duration spirit power scaling reduced from 0.07 to 0.05
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation incoming damage reduction reduced from 70% to 55%
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation changed from 70% debuff reduction to the same buff as {{Icon|Unstoppable}} Unstoppable
Items:
- Updated {{Icon|Restorative Shot}} Restorative Shot impact and heal effects
- Updated {{Icon|Phantom Strike}} Phantom Strike effects
- Updated {{Icon|Restorative Locket}} Restorative Locket effects when casting on an ally
- Fixed {{Icon|Majestic Leap}} Majestic Leap buff sticking around after attaching to zipline (caused audio bugs as well)
- Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy's {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb, {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox's {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade, {{Icon|Warden}} Warden's {{Icon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask, {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta's {{Icon|Stake}} Stake, {{Icon|Alchemical Fire}} Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
- Bonus health reduced from +50 to +40
- Weapon damage reduced from +8% to +6%
- Ammo increased from +20% to +24%
- Ammo reduced from 15% to 12%
- Weapon damage reduced from 8% to 6%
- Min distance reduced from 20m to 18m
- Added 0.2s grace period where the reload start does not count any button presses
- Active fire rate increased from 18% to 24%
- Cooldown reduced from 23s to 21s
- Cooldown reduced from 14s to 12s
- Bonus health increased from 75 to 100
- Now innately gives +12% fire rate
- Conditional fire rate now only triggers when you hit a hero, this bonus is reduced from 40% to 30%
- Lifesteal increased from 16% to 18%
- Active duration reduced from 8s to 5s
- Active movement speed increased from 2 to 3
- Active fire rate increased from 20% to 25%
- No longer has 10% reload penalty
- Now requires {{Icon|Slowing Bullets}} Slowing Bullets (total cost from 6500 to 7700)
- Innately gives 25% slow for 1.3s
- Active no longer applies 30% slow for 2s
- Weapon damage reduced from 25% to 15%
- Active spirit resist increased from 30% to 40%
- Active lifesteal increased from 80% to 100%
- Weapon damage increased from 65% to 70%
- Health regen increased from 2 to 2.3
- Bonus health increased from 35 to 45
- Cooldown reduced from 8s to 7s
- Lifesteal increased from 24% to 26%
- Now grants +10% weapon damage
- Now a T2 Vitality item. Grants +30% debuff resist, +75 health and +10% weapon damage. No longer has an active.
- T3 Vitality Item that upgrades from {{Icon|Debuff Reducer}} Debuff Reducer. Removes debuffs fully on cast again. Grants +3 m/s for 3s if any debuff is removed. Grants +40% debuff resist, +125 health, +20% weapon damage. Cooldown: 45
- Health increased from 225 to 250
- Added a brief period before you can press the hotkey again to prevent accidental uses of drop down
- Now grants +6% bullet resist
- Fixed it sometimes malfunctioning and not teleporting to the target
- {{Icon|Spirit Lifesteal}} Spirit Lifesteal increased from 33% to 35%
- {{Icon|Bullet Lifesteal}} Bullet Lifesteal increased from 30% to 35%
- Duration reduced from 9s to 6s
- No longer grants +20% spirit resist in the active
- Now grants +15% spirit resist innately
- Now grants +12 spirit power
- Now grants +1 m/s
- Now grants +6% weapon damage
- Ammo reduced from +20% to +15%
- Spirit shield increased from +75 to +85
- Cast range increased from 15m to 17m
- Cooldown reduction increased from 12% to 13%
- No longer has +75 health
- Now gives +150 spirit shield
- Non-Imbued range increased from +20% to +25%
- Active movement speed increased from 2 to 3
- Cooldown reduced from 8s to 6s
- Now gives +15% ability range
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation changed from 70% debuff reduction to the same buff as {{Icon|Unstoppable}} Unstoppable

- Lifesteal increased from 24% to 26%
- {{Icon|Bullet Lifesteal}} Bullet Lifesteal increased from 30% to 35%
Unstoppable:
- Duration reduced from 9s to 6s
- No longer grants +20% spirit resist in the active
- Now grants +15% spirit resist innately
- Now grants +12 spirit power
- Now grants +1 m/s
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation changed from 70% debuff reduction to the same buff as {{Icon|Unstoppable}} Unstoppable
Spirit Lifesteal: - {{Icon|Spirit Lifesteal}} Spirit Lifesteal increased from 33% to 35%
Mystic Reverb:
- Cooldown reduced from 8s to 6s
- Now gives +15% ability range
Charged Shot: - Added {{Icon|Grey Talon}} Grey Talon {{Icon|Charged Shot}} Charged Shot sound effects
Rain of Arrows: - {{Icon|Rain of Arrows}} Rain of Arrows flight duration reduced from 8s to 7s
Ivy:
- Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy's {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb, {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox's {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade, {{Icon|Warden}} Warden's {{Icon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask, {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta's {{Icon|Stake}} Stake, {{Icon|Alchemical Fire}} Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
- Base damage growth increased from 0.35 to 0.55
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant replicated healing reduced from 45% to 35%
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant bullet lifesteal now scales with spirit power (0.18)
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant fire rate reduced from 15% to 10%
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant fire rate now scales with spirit power (0.2)
- Fixed {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb not going where you had targeted if you moved quickly during the cast
Ground Strike:
- {{Icon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike damage per meter reduced from 6.75 to 6.3
- {{Icon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike damage per meter spirit power scaling increased from 0.04 to 0.05
Scorn:
- Fixed ability-based lifesteals not granting life from damage caused to shields (affects things like Hyperbeam T3, Siphon, {{Icon|Scorn}} Scorn, {{Icon|Life Drain}} Life Drain, {{Icon|Flog}} Flog and {{Icon|Concussive Combustion}} Concussive Combustion T3)
- Fixed {{Icon|Scorn}} Scorn not healing you against shields
Paradox:
- Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy's {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb, {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox's {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade, {{Icon|Warden}} Warden's {{Icon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask, {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta's {{Icon|Stake}} Stake, {{Icon|Alchemical Fire}} Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
- Fixed {{Icon|Time Wall}} Time Wall projectiles and bullets being stuck in the wall for its full duration instead of for the shorter time stop duration
- {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine collision radius reduced by 10%
- Fixed {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade not going where you had targeted if you moved quickly during the cast
Time Wall: - Fixed {{Icon|Time Wall}} Time Wall projectiles and bullets being stuck in the wall for its full duration instead of for the shorter time stop duration
Kinetic Carbine: - {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine collision radius reduced by 10%
Warden:
- Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy's {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb, {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox's {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade, {{Icon|Warden}} Warden's {{Icon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask, {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta's {{Icon|Stake}} Stake, {{Icon|Alchemical Fire}} Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
- Reload time no longer scales with spirit power
- Now innately gains additive fire rate from spirit power (scale factor is 0.015)
Alchemical Flask: - Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy's {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb, {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox's {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade, {{Icon|Warden}} Warden's {{Icon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask, {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta's {{Icon|Stake}} Stake, {{Icon|Alchemical Fire}} Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
Misc:
- Reworked the core base area where the Weakened Patron goes. It is now in a low terrain pit and requires attackers be inside the pit to do damage to it.
- Redesigned exit from the base's regeneration area to the rest of the base
- Increased Weakened Patron's out of combat (30s) regeneration from 40 to 80
- Removed platform blocking line of sight from regeneration area exit to the center
- Added window in fountain barrier beside exit
- Added two drop down chutes from fountain to the center
- Base respawn time increased from 8s to 12s (peak values unchanged)
- Guardian health increased by 10%
- Base Guardian health increased by 10%
- Zipline Boost duration increased from 25s to 32s
- Urn now grants the Urn Runner +1 AP
- Urn Runner now gains +2 sprint and is disarmed while carrying the Urn
- Urn bounty increased from 900 + 200/min to 1500 + 200/min (10 min spawn goes from 2900 to 3500)
- Urn display on the minimap is now pulsing a green rectangle showing where the destination is if an ally is carrying the urn, and a red rectangle at the destination if an enemy is carrying it
- Powerup Bonus duration increased from 100s to 130s
- Movement powerup now grants +20% stamina regeneration
- Fixed Movement powerup not replenishing stamina on pickup
- Golden Statues level 2 bonuses spawn time reduced from 25 minutes to 20 minutes
- Golden Statues Weapon Damage bonus increased from 2% to 3% (level 2 from 3% to 4%)
- Golden Statues Ammo bonus increased from 3% to 4% (level 2 from 5% to 6%)
- Capture radius for breakable drops increased very slightly
- Added an indicator near the reticle when Parry is on cooldown
- Added a visual effect when the Rejuvenator is attackable
- Global base Ammo increased by 5% (except for {{Icon|Wraith}} Wraith and {{Icon|Haze}} Haze)
- The spawn area's regeneration buff now lingers for 1s
- Bullet falloff damage now starts at 22m instead of 25m
- Base Guardian and Shrines bullet resist per nearby hero increased from 40/20/0/0% (for 0/1/2/3 people) to 60/40/20/0%
- Trooper gold sharing radius from the location of the soul orb increased from 50m to 60m
- Fixed ability-based lifesteals not granting life from damage caused to shields (affects things like Hyperbeam T3, Siphon, {{Icon|Scorn}} Scorn, {{Icon|Life Drain}} Life Drain, {{Icon|Flog}} Flog and {{Icon|Concussive Combustion}} Concussive Combustion T3)
- Fixed dropping unsecured souls not lowering your net worth
- Fixed a bug that caused denies during the laning phase to sometimes be shared with allies and sometimes not
- Some tweaks to how the comeback formula works have been done over the past couple days and we'll continue iterating on it over the coming days
- Added several upper level juke closets from balconies/awnings and two on rooftops
- Shortened connection to the underground tunnel from the shop side
- Adjusted pathing in the underground tunnel to be a little less zig zagging
- Added more signage to the underground tunnel
- Redesigned interior of new stairwells beside inner lane Walkers
Crow Familiar: - {{Icon|Crow Familiar}} Crow Familiar duration spirit power scaling reduced from 0.07 to 0.05

- Added a brief period before you can press the hotkey again to prevent accidental uses of drop down

Debuff Reducer:
- Now a T2 Vitality item. Grants +30% debuff resist, +75 health and +10% weapon damage. No longer has an active.
- T3 Vitality Item that upgrades from {{Icon|Debuff Reducer}} Debuff Reducer. Removes debuffs fully on cast again. Grants +3 m/s for 3s if any debuff is removed. Grants +40% debuff resist, +125 health, +20% weapon damage. Cooldown: 45
Debuff Remover: - T3 Vitality Item that upgrades from {{Icon|Debuff Reducer}} Debuff Reducer. Removes debuffs fully on cast again. Grants +3 m/s for 3s if any debuff is removed. Grants +40% debuff resist, +125 health, +20% weapon damage. Cooldown: 45

- {{Icon|Shoulder Charge}} Shoulder Charge speed increased by 25%
